quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Shenzhen Pagoda Industrial (Group) Corporation Ltd. - H Shs
quote.nm: Shenzhen Pagoda Industrial (Group) Corporation Ltd. - H Shs
quote.summary: Shenzhen Pagoda Industrial Group Corp Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in operating a franchised retail network and trading of fruits. The Company mainly operates its business through three segments. The Franchising segment is engaged in the operation of franchised and self-owned retail networks to distribute the fruit and other food products. The Trading segment is engaged in the sales of fruit and other food products under short term contracts to overseas and local corporate customers, including food retail companies, supermarkets and fruit markets. The Others segment is engaged in local sales to individuals of fruit items other than those offered to franchisees and regional dealers and other businesses. The Company conducts its business in the domestic and overseas markets.
